Title: PTDF names successful 2025/26 scholarship candidates
Summary: The Petroleum Technology Development Fund (PTDF) has announced the release of the list of successful candidates for its 2025/2026 overseas scholarship scheme for Master's and Doctoral studies . The scheme is a competitive funding programme which supports Nigerian students in pursuing academic studies .

Title: Zamfara constitutes committee to support victims of banditry
Summary: Zamfara State Government has established a Standing Committee to support victims of banditry attacks across the state . The responsibilities of the committee include providing emergency relief and sympathy visits to victims within 48 hours of any attack .

Summary: The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) urges Nigerians to imbibe the culture of transparency and accountability to fully eradicate corruption in the country . The EFCC chairman says Nigerians can overcome corruption .

Title: JUST IN: Ex-soldiers resume protest over unpaid benefits
Summary: A group of discharged Nigerian soldiers on Thursday resumed protests in Abuja, demanding the payment of their entitlements . The ex-soldiers called off their protest on August 4, after a meeting with officials of the Ministries of Defence and Finance . They accused the authorities of neglect and failure to honour promises made after their meeting last month .

Title: Edo special security squad arrests nine suspected cultists
Summary: The Edo State Special Security Squad has arrested nine suspected cultists and recovered firearms in Iguoshodin N’ Ikpemaba, Ovia North East Local Government Area . The operation was carried out in collaboration with security agencies and community stakeholders after credible intelligence was received from residents .

Title: Police hunt suspected cyber stalkers in Bayelsa
Summary: The Bayelsa State Police Command has launched a manhunt for four girls allegedly involved in a case of indecent assault, attempted murder, cyberbullying, cyber stalking and adoption . The 19-year-old took to social media to reveal her ugly experience and also petitioned the police over the alleged release of the suspects on bail .
